mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname, u.login_type loginType, d.dog_name dogName, d.profile_image profileImage, d.breed breed, floor((TO_DAYS(NOW()) - (TO_DAYS(d.birth))) / 365) age, d.gender gender, d.birth birth FROM users u LEFT JOIN dogs d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
